20101215010724.500|20101215010727.000|CCO|>> THIS IS EERILY SIMILAR TO A 
20101215010727.000|20101215010729.500|CCO|STRING OF 2006 MURDERS IN THE 
20101215010729.500|20101215010732.000|CCO|ATLANTA BEACH AREA.

20101215010734.857|20101215010736.286|CCO|SESSION."

20101215010737.714|20101215010739.143|CCO|>> THERE ARE VARIOUS FORMS OF 
20101215010739.143|20101215010740.571|CCO|DECOMPOSITION FOR THESE REMAINS 
20101215010740.571|20101215010742.000|CCO|BECAUSE SOME WERE SKELETAL, SOME
20101215010742.000|20101215010744.000|CCO|WERE WRAPPED IN THAT BURLAP BAG 
20101215010744.000|20101215010746.000|CCO|AND AUTHORITIES ARE SAYING THEY 
20101215010746.000|20101215010748.000|CCO|ARE GOING TO USE DNA,
